title: League of Legends Screensaver Virus?
body: AVG Antivirus randomly detected this thing as a virus (which isn't true.) and trying to reinstall it gives me an error. Does anybody know how to fix this? I very much enjoyed seeing Kled every day.

replies.body: What exact error are you seeing when you attempt to reinstall the Screensaver application?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WJAqvdgW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-18T04:47:00.418+0000)
>
> What exact error are you seeing when you attempt to reinstall the Screensaver application?

Sorry for the late reply! (School and whatnot.) 
It states: Error Opening file for writing:
C:Riot Games/LolScreenSaver/browser/libEGL.dll
Click 'Retry' to try again, or 'Cancel' to stop the installation.

Can you try temporarily disabling AVG before going to the **C:\Riot Games** folder and deleting the **LolScreenSaver** folder if it still exists. Afterwards, you can try installing the screensaver application again.

I hope this did the trick!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WJAqvdgW,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-19T00:46:51.287+0000)
>
> Can you try temporarily disabling AVG before going to the **C:\Riot Games** folder and deleting the **LolScreenSaver** folder if it still exists. Afterwards, you can try installing the screensaver application again.
> 
> I hope this did the trick!

Hello, Bladedude. You are now my hero. Thank you very much. Worked like an Ahri E. Now I can see Kled every mornin' like the good times!

Ayyyy, waking up like:

[**This.**](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/94/7b/c9/947bc9391533a5c25919a89086d12ea0.gif)

Keep it real, fam.
Yup! You can find it [**HERE.**](http://screensaver.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US) Enjoy! ( ^_^)Ôºè
